Feb. 15, 1976 D NWABBA Contest (Third Section)
NWABBA Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-contest-third-section
Sirius [Wright]
Bolton Town Hall, Bolton, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50 and rose bowl, 2nd £30 and trophy, 3rd £20 and shield. 6 bands competed.
May 18, 2013, 2:02 p.m. May 21, 2015, 9:47 a.m.

2 Parr (St. Helens) Band Bob Kerwick
3 Golborne Band C. Moore
Unknown Result Christ Church (Bradford) Silver Ernie Wedgewood
